deliveryCell - Variable in class controllers.DeliveryOrdersController
 
DeliveryOperatorController - Class in controllers
DeliveryOperatorController is a controller class for Main Delivery Operator panel for FXML file: DeliveryOperatorPanel.fxml It has one method "moveToForm" that will move to Delivery Orders Form screen that method connected to 'deliveryBtn' button Methods "back" and "setUp" are not implemented (extends AbstractController)
DeliveryOperatorController() - Constructor for class controllers.DeliveryOperatorController
 
DeliveryOrdersController - Class in controllers
DeliveryOrdersController is a controller class for Order Deliveries Screen for FXML file: DeliveryOrdersForm.fxml It has FXML attributes for Buttons, Labels, TextFields, TableColumn and TableView It has HashMap "dataMap" that store each OrderID (askey) and the order data (as value) It has ObservableList that stores deliveries data at each new mysql 'SELECT' action It has 3 final integer attributes for calculation of estimated delivery date and time Method "setUp" is not implemented (extends AbstractController)
DeliveryOrdersController() - Constructor for class controllers.DeliveryOrdersController
 
deliverySelected() - Method in class controllers.OrderMethodFormController
deliverySelected handles the case when the user has selected the delivery option.
destinationID - Variable in class Util.Msg
 
disapproveBtnClick() - Method in class controllers.ApproveCustomersController
gets triggered when region manager clicked on disapproveCustomerBtn calls sendStatusUpdate that updates the user specified status to Not Approved
disapproveCustomerBtn - Variable in class controllers.ApproveCustomersController
 
Disconnect - Enum constant in enum Util.Tasks
 
disconnectFromServer() - Method in class server.ServerController
Disconnects from the server and drops the connection to mysql DB and appends a message to server console.

Sets the current connection to null for closing mysql DB connection.
